Gateway
Class Key

java.lang.Object
  Shape2D
      Gateway.Key

public class Key
extends Shape2D

Shape controlled by player. Can change shape and color at the player's command. Represented by a filled shape.

Constructor Summary
Key(double x, double y)
          Creates a key at the specified coordinates with the default properties (red, circle).
 
Method Summary
 double absAngle()
          Returns the angle of rotation of the key.
 double angle()
          Returns the angle of rotation of the portal.
 double centerX()
          Returns the x-coordinate of the center of the key.
 double centerY()
          Returns the y-coordinate of the center of the key.
 void moveTo(double x, double y)
          Moves the key's center coordinates to the specified ones.
 void paintComponent(java.awt.Graphics2D g2)
          Paints the key onto the container, rotating it as needed.
 void rotate()
          Rotates the key to the left by one increment.
 java.awt.Shape shape()
          Returns the shape representation of the key, different based on the myShape field.
 java.lang.String shapeName()
          Returns the name of the key's shape.
 void shiftColor()
          Changes the key's color to the next one.
 void shiftShape()
          Changes the key's shape to the next one.
